trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Medfield
There was one other sighting in Medfield on or around November 18th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsit was 7:30pm i was going to the car to get my backpack to do my homework and i felt a strange pull to look up into the sky and when i did i saw three black triangles flying above me no sound no jet stream no nothing let me tell you it scared me like heck so i wnet in my house to get my orion telescope to view the event but when i came back i saw they where heading WS so i call my friend and he said he just saw them to and then i tried to get him to take a picture but he didnt have his ipod touch with him at the time and after that i havent saw it since but i have been looking up to the night sky more often just hoping i would be able to see it one more time....
Summary: there was 3 black triangles flying over my house with 3 white lights and a red in the middle
